patthana14.16:4.1: Āsavañceva sāsavañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naāsavo ceva naanāsavo ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.16:4.2: Āsavañceva sāsavañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naanāsavo ceva nano ca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.16:4.3: Āsavañceva sāsavañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naāsavo ceva naanāsavo ca naanāsavo ceva nano ca āsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana14.16:5.1: Sāsavañceva no ca āsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanāsavo ceva nano ca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana14.16:6.1: Āsavañceva sāsavañca sāsavañceva no ca āsavañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naāsavo ceva naanāsavo ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana14.16:7.1: Hetuyā nava … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate nava.
